description: Numbers n such that 4 and 6 occur juxtaposed in the base 7 representation of n but not of n+1.
mathematica: Transpose[SequencePosition[Table[If[SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[n,7],{4,6}]>0||SequenceCount[IntegerDigits[n,7],{6,4}]>0,1,0],{n,1200}],{1,0}]][[1]] (* The program uses the SequencePosition and SequenceCount functions from Mathematica version 10 *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 29 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
